content: अनुराध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Causing welfare; also written as अनूराध; इंद्रं वयमनूराधं हवामहे <ls>Av.</ls> {@--2@} Born under the asterism अनुराधा <ls>P. IV. 3. 34.</ls> --धा [अनुगता राधां विशाखां] <ab>N.</ab> of the 17th of the 27 lunar mansions or asterisms (so called because it follows राधा or विशाखा). It consists of four stars.
